Name: Azure Database - Import Create New vcpu
Description:
Restores a bacpac to a new database

*Depends on az cli*

*Source database requires 'Allow Azure services and resources to access this server' option turn on in the SQL server firewall*

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.azAccount
Parameters.Label: Azure Account
Parameters.HelpText: Azure account with permissions to the subscription and resource group

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.resourceGroup
Parameters.Label: Resource Group
Parameters.HelpText: Resource group name housing the target SQL server

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.server
Parameters.Label: SQL Server
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the Azure SQL server

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.dbName
Parameters.Label: Database Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the database that will be created

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.edition
Parameters.Label: Edition
Parameters.HelpText: The edition component of the sku

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.computeModel
Parameters.Label: Compute Model
Parameters.HelpText: The compute model of the database.  Only applicable for general purpose instances

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.family
Parameters.Label: Hardware Configuration
Parameters.HelpText: Select Between Gen5, Fsv2 , or M-Series.  Please note the documented vCPU overrides if listed.

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
Gen5|Gen5
Fsv2|Fsv2 (General Purpose, Compute Optimized 72 vCPUs)
M|M-Series (Business Critical, Memory Opimized 128 vCPUs)

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.coreCount
Parameters.Label: vCPU Core Count
Parameters.HelpText:
the number of vCores to use.
*General purpose FSv2 hardware is set to 72*

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
1|1 (Only available for general purpose, serverless instances)
2|2
4|4
6|6
8|8
10|10
12|12
14|14
16|16
18|18
20|20
24|24
32|32
40|40
80|80 (Not available for general purpose, serverless instances)

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.maxsize
Parameters.Label: Max Storage Size
Parameters.HelpText: The max storage size.  If no unit is specified, defaults to bytes (B)

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.elasticPool
Parameters.Label: Elastic Pool
Parameters.HelpText: The name or resource id of the elastic pool to create the database in

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.zoneRedundant
Parameters.Label: Zone Redundant
Parameters.HelpText: Specifies whether to enable zone redundancy.  This property is only applied to Business Critical databases.

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.readScale
Parameters.Label: Read Scale
Parameters.HelpText: If enabled, connections that have application intent set to read only in their connection string may be routed to a read only secondary replica.  This property is only applied to Business Critical databases.

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.readReplicaCount
Parameters.Label: Read Reaplica Count
Parameters.HelpText: The number of readonly replicas to provision for the database. This property is only applied to hyperscale databases.

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.tags
Parameters.Label: Tags
Parameters.HelpText: Space-separated tags.  `key[=value] key[=value]`

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.blobAccessKey
Parameters.Label: Azure Blob Access Key
Parameters.HelpText: the access key (Shared Access Key or Storage Access Key) to grant access to the storage account

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.accessKeyType
Parameters.Label: Access Key Type
Parameters.HelpText: The type of key the access key represents

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
SharedAccessKey|Shared Access Key
StorageAccessKey|Storage Access Key

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.ContainerUri
Parameters.Label: Container Uri
Parameters.HelpText: The URI of the container to save the exported database in.  Format is: `https://{StorageAccountName}.blob.core.windows.net/{ContainerName}`

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.backupName
Parameters.Label: Backup Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the file being saved.  Defaults to DB Name

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.adminName
Parameters.Label: SQL Server Admin Name
Parameters.HelpText: The admin name of the SQL server containing the database you wish to import

Parameters.Name: azDbImportNewVCPU.adminPwd
Parameters.Label: SQL Server Admin Password
Parameters.HelpText: The admin password of the SQL server containing the database you wish to import
